comment: Ms. Dodd is so kind and a wonderful teacher.
I loved Ms. Dodd/Mrs. Wise. She was amazing, sweet, fun, and actually cared about her students. I'm sad she's going to Texas or I'd take her for every Psych class.
I loved this class.  Ms. Dodd is an awesome teacher and if you just show up to class and pay attention this class is very easy to ace.
Ms. Dodd is an amazing teacher.  This class was so much fun and if you just show up and pay attention it is so easy to pass.  Loved it.

Fairly easy class with a lot of reading. She Lectures from slides which are posted online. You should attend class for better clarification of slides. Over all she is a good teacher. 5 question quizzes, which are randomly picked from notes, so you must study entire chapter. 3 papers 4 quizzes, 2 test and final.
